boardgame.description: Things gets quite spooky on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Spirit Stairs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. There's a race in the old castle ruin, and the most courageous have the edge. The ghost lives at the top of the stairs. Being completely quiet, a few brave children dart up the stairs- everyone wants to be first to scare the ghost with a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;BOOOO! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;But the ghost knows this age-old game and tries to transform the players into ghosts - one after the other one!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every turn players roll an enchanted die to see how fast they climb the stairs, if a player rolls a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;ghost_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, he may place a ghost piece over another player's pawn. A magic magnetic field connects the two and the pawn disappears! Now the players must remember for the remainder of the game under which ghost their own figure is. If all players are transformed and another _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;ghost_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; rolled, two ghosts may be exchanged. Whoever can make it to the top of the stairs amidst the chaos wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ages 4 and up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Flaschengeist 5 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 6 Player expansion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: In shrink from Drei Magier Spiel. Fun for Halloween. Estimated shipping in U.S. $9.00 VA residents pay 5% sales tax.
In shrink from Drei Magier Spiel. Magnetic fun! Last one in stock. Estimated shipping in U.S. $9.00 VA residents pay 5% sales tax.

All instructions and game components are present and in excellent shape. One board section has creasing and some separation where the board was folded incorrectly, but the board still lies flat. Feel free to email for detailed pictures. Split corner on the box lid has been repaired with tape (on the inside of the box lid).

This item is listed for the house fire fundraiser auction and was won by chanceisr. The bid was $31 for Geistertreppe. These will be shipped via USPS Priority mail as soon as I can get an address. The shipping costs will be the exact amount of shipping.

This is a Korean edition but this is a language independant game.You can see the rule from review here BGG. The rule is very very simple.
